derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin, literally work'

entry.tran: （按创作的先后次序排列的某一作曲家的）编号作品（缩略形式为op.）
entry.def: An opus is a piece of classical music by a particular composer. Opus is usually followed by a number which indicates at what point the piece was written. The abbreviation op. is also used.

example.ex: ...Beethoven's Piano Sonata in E minor, Opus 90.
example.tran: 贝多芬的第90号E小调钢琴奏鸣曲

entry.tran: 艺术作品；乐曲；著作；画作
entry.def: You can refer to an artistic work such as a piece of music or writing or a painting as an opus .

means.word_mean: 1. a musical work that has been created;

sentences.sentence: "the composition is written in four movements"
